body:
aight.
Waiting for the english translation
So basically a cockblock app cliche with the extreme fetish dilution replaced with normal manga stuff. Pretty great

@NotALolicon782 since I have the English translation from tsf_no_f's Patreon. I can tell you that it's about the guy taking care of this neighbor's kid, dress up app shenanigans ensue, the guy slowly loses himself and mentally becomes, a 3-year-old girl. I would consider getting it from their Patreon since the quality is higher and you can get the full experience and not just the art. You can find their patreon on pixiv (that's where I found it)
somebody pls explain me what the fuck its going on.
Surprised no age-regression tag. As far as those go, I think this is a nice non-H example.
我原本还以为是可爱的萝莉控的本本,看到最后才发现到是腹黑都爆了奇怪故事
